titles.title: Immigration Moratorium Act of 1994
A bill to impose a moratorium on immigration by aliens other than refugees, certain priority and skilled workers, and immediate relatives of United States citizens and permanent resident aliens.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S13097-13098)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 9/21/1994--Introduced. Immigration Moratorium Act of 1994 - Imposes a five-year immigration moratorium, with exceptions for refugees, certain priority and skilled workers, and immediate family members.
